entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , White Rock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM PST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: White Rock 10:00 PM PST Friday 20 January 2023
Temperature: 2.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 1.7°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending late in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Periods of wet snow over higher terrain in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the water in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 20 January 2023
